rules_text:
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Anakin Skywalker.
Sacrifice another creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
If Anakin Skywalker would die, instead remove all damage from him, remove him from combat, transform him.
rules_text2:
Lifelink, menace
Whenever Darth Vader attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Darth Vader. [i](The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.)[/i]
